subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Bubba Watson and Jeff Overton were selected by the United States Ryder Cup captain, Corey Pavin, to anchor the morning matches against Luke Donald and Padraig Harrington.
snippet: Bubba Watson and Jeff Overton were selected by the United States Ryder Cup captain, Corey Pavin, to anchor the morning matches against Luke Donald and Padraig Harrington.
